prompt: Create a minimalist task manager interface with a clean white background and subtle green accent colors. Design a simple top bar with just 'Tasks' as the title in elegant typography, no additional icons. Display tasks as minimalist list items with small circular checkboxes, clean sans-serif typography, and subtle dividers between items. Use a simple text-based priority system (H/M/L) in small green circles, minimal due date display without icons, and remove the three-dot menu for a cleaner look. Replace the floating action button with a simple 'Add Task' text button at the bottom. Use a minimal tab bar with just text labels and subtle underlines for active states. Emphasize whitespace, clean lines, and typography hierarchy over decorative elements.
